abilities.name: Metal Symbol
abilities.effect: Each of your Pokémon that has any Metal Energy attached to it can't be affected by any Special Conditions. Remove any Special Conditions affecting those Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dueling Saber
attacks.effect: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Iron Rule-GX
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, their Pokémon can't attack. (This includes Pokémon that come into play on that turn.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
